response.overview: An aged man is obsessed with the idea of buying a new Lexus. The whole house is filled with pictures of the car. He is counting the days when he will take her home. But not everyone shares his joy. His wife is not happy with his obsession. He literally moves to live in a car. His wife calls the children to help with their father, but unsuccessfully. At some point, his wife decides to take revenge on him and sells the house. With the proceeds, she buys a Lexus super car and plans to go on a vacation. He is shocked. She invites him with her and he accepts the invitation. He passes his car keys to his son and they drive away. Son is in his father's car and absolutely obsessed as his father was. The story repeats.
response.title: Obsession
